name: Modern
description: Two-column modern resume with bold color accents, clean section breaks, and clear headings. Ideal for tech, marketing, and creative professionals.

sections.title: Summary
sections.content: Innovative UX Designer with 8+ years of experience creating user-centered digital products for SaaS and e-commerce. Expert in design systems, prototyping, and cross-functional collaboration.

jobs.title: Lead UX Designer
bullets: Directed UX strategy for a B2B SaaS platform used by 50,000+ users, increasing user retention by 22%.
Led a team of 4 designers in launching a mobile e-commerce app that won a 2023 Webby Award.
Established a company-wide design system, reducing design debt and dev handoff time by 30%.

jobs.title: UX Designer
bullets: Designed and prototyped new features for a cloud-based productivity suite.
Conducted 100+ user interviews and usability tests to inform product decisions.
Collaborated with engineers and PMs to deliver 10+ successful product launches.

education.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Interaction Design
